content: The Warehouse Group is the largest retailer in New Zealand with more than 100 stores, currently piloting Matterport and BIM for Enterprise to bring spatial intelligence to the forefront of their retail planning business, using Matterport, they are able to identify every centimeter of shelf space and use location intelligence to plan and maximize product placement and store aisle layouts with greater precision, speed and efficiency. That's as simple as just for any professional photographer or professional service person of any kind that could now very easily use their own smartphone in their pocket, plus a very low-cost device in Matterport Access to produce something that we're seeing, meeting the standard for mid-market and enterprise as much as it is for a small business.
